SEARCH
Package spaceInvaders.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
spaceInvaders.Model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents the player in the Space Invaders game. This class manages the properties and behaviors of the player, including position, movement, lives, and score.
Version:
1.0
Author:
MD Amanullah

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Player object. This representation includes details about the player's position (x and y coordinates), speed, dimensions (width and height), the number of lives, and the current score. This method is useful for debugging purposes to quickly get an overview of the player's current state.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string that represents the current state of the player, including its position, speed, dimensions, lives, and score.
